RESIDENCES

 

Residences

THE RESIDENCES START AT THE EQUIVALENT OF 10 FLOORS ABOVE THE STREET, WHICH, TOGETHER WITH THE MID-BLOCK LOCATION, ALLOWS FOR UNPARALLELED VIEWS IN A QUIET SETTING.
 

Living Room

THE LIVING ROOMS, MANY WITH TEN FOOT CLEAR CEILINGS, ARE QUITE SPACIOUS WITH SUBLIME AND PRACTICAL LAYOUTS IDEAL FOR ENT-ERTAINING AS WELL AS DAILY LIVING.
 

Kitchen

FORM IS NEVER FORGOTTEN IN THE PURSUIT OF FUNCTION. FROM THE MOMENT YOU ENTER, A SKILLFUL AND SOOTHING MIX OF MATERIALS ENVELOPS YOU; FROM THE LACQUER POGGENPOHL CABINETRY TO THE MARBLE COUNTERS & BACKSPLASHES.
 

Kitchen

THE KITCHENS AT 35XV BOAST PREMIUM MIELE APPLIANCES INCLUDING; REFRIGERATOR, DISHWASHER, MICROWAVE, OVEN, COOKTOP AND HOOD. EACH RESIDENCE INCLUDES A VENTED MIELE WASHER/DRYER AS WELL. SUB-ZERO WINE COOLERS COMPLETE THE SUMPTUOUS KITCHEN EXPERIENCE.
 

Bathroom

THE MASTER BATHROOMS AT 35XV ARE SERENE AND SPA-LIKE WITH OVERSIZED MIRRORS, DARK MARBLE FLOORS AND WHITE MARBLE COUNTERTOPS. THE MASTER BATHROOMS FEATURE RADIANT FLOOR HEATING, STEAM SHOWERS, AND SOAKING TUBS WHILE
 

Powder Room

ALL OF THE BATHROOMS INCLUDE A COLLECTION OF BESPOKE TOUCHES–FROM POWDER-COATED CUSTOM GROHE FIXTURES, DISTINCT CUSTOM VANITIES AND LIGHTING CREATED SOLELY FOR 35XV.

FEATURED
PLAN

SERVICES &
AMENITIES

 

Arrival

A FULL-TIME ATTENDANT IN THE LOBBY WILL BE WAITING TO HELP YOU AT ANY TIME DAY OR NIGHT. THE INVITING ENTRANCE LOBBY IS THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED - EVERY CHAIR, ANGLE AND FABRIC SERVES A PURPOSE, ESTABLISHING BALANCE, WARMTH, REFLECTING LIGHT, BRINGING THE OUTSIDE IN AND THE INSIDE OUT.
 

Lobby

A FULL-TIME ATTENDANT IN THE LOBBY WILL BE WAITING TO HELP YOU AT ANY TIME DAY OR NIGHT. THE INVITING ENTRANCE LOBBY IS THOUGHTFULLY DESIGNED - EVERY CHAIR, ANGLE AND FABRIC SERVES A PURPOSE, ESTABLISHING BALANCE, WARMTH, REFLECTING LIGHT, BRINGING THE OUTSIDE IN AND THE INSIDE OUT.
 

Mailroom

TOUCHES OF LUXURY REACH EVEN THE SIMPLEST FEATURES OF 35XV –THE MAIL ROOM IS ENTIRELY CAST IN A WARM SENSUOUS PALETTE, WITH A WALL OF BRONZE MAILBOXES, SHOWCASING THE CRAFT OF DESIGN.
 

Terrace

THE 75-FOOT-WIDE TERRACE IS THE ULTIMATE EXPRESSION OF THE “SKYMARK” LIFESTYLE, ERASING THE DISTINCTION BETWEEN INDOOR AND OUTDOOR LIVING WHILE PERCHED 80 FEET ABOVE THE GROUND.
 

Lounge

THE LOUNGE IS ANOTHER STRIKING PART OF THE AMENITIES FLOOR. IT IS A SLEEK AND COMFORTABLE OASIS FROM THE ORDINARY. UNWIND BEFORE HEADING OVER TO THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CENTER OR AFTER ENJOYING A MEAL OR A GLASS OF WINE IN THE ADJACENT DINING ROOM.
 

Wine Cellar & Dining Room

GRAB A VINTAGE BOTTLE FROM YOUR PERSONAL STORAGE CABINET IN THE FULLY REFRIGERATED WALK-IN WINE CELLAR AND HEAD BACK TO YOUR RESIDENCE OR GATHER FRIENDS AND FAMILY IN THE DINING ROOM TO ENJOY A LOVELY CATERED EXPERIENCE.
 

Fitness

THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CENTER LOOKS ONTO THE EXPANSIVE OUTDOOR TERRACE AND INCLUDES THE FINEST STATE OF THE ART EQUIPMENT; FROM THE FLOORS TO THE FURNISHING, THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CENTER IS A GYM REIMAGINED WHERE GORGEOUS CHAIRS REPLACE UTILITARIAN FURNITURE, AND THE ENVIRONMENT EXUDES REFINEMENT.
 

Playroom

THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CENTER LOOKS ONTO THE EXPANSIVE OUTDOOR TERRACE AND INCLUDES THE FINEST STATE OF THE ART EQUIPMENT; FROM THE FLOORS TO THE FURNISHING, THE HEALTH AND FITNESS CENTER IS A GYM REIMAGINED WHERE GORGEOUS CHAIRS REPLACE UTILITARIAN FURNITURE, AND THE ENVIRONMENT EXUDES REFINEMENT.

NEIGHBORHOOD

';

TEAM

Alchemy

Alchemy Properties Inc., founded in 1990, is a privately held, fully integrated real estate firm whose principals have over 80 years of experience in acquiring, developing, financing and selling luxury real estate in the New York City area. Alchemy is led by its three principals, Kenneth S. Horn (founding principal), Joel Breitkopf and Gerald R. Davis. Alchemy is headquartered in Manhattan and has developed almost thirty (30) projects in New York City. Notable residential projects include The Sackett & Union Condominiums and Townhomes, The ISIS Condominium, Griffin Court Condominium, Hudson Hill Condominium, Indigo Condominium, Oculus Condominium, and the much anticipated upper portion of the world landmark, The Woolworth Building.

Angelo Gordon

Angelo, Gordon & Co. began acquiring commercial real estate in 1993 and has purchased over $16 billion of assets. With real estate offices in New York, Los Angeles, London, Amsterdam, Hong Kong, Seoul, Tokyo and Shanghai they have a global view of the market, with a strong emphasis on the United States and Asia. Angelo, Gordon’s real estate team’s experience encompasses all aspects of real estate investment and management, including acquisition, financing, disposition, leasing, and construction management. Their real estate investment professionals have hands-on operational real estate expertise that has proved to be critical to their success in acquiring and positioning assets.

FX Fowle

FXFOWLE Architects is an architectural, interior design, planning, and urban design firm with over 35 years’ experience. They are the recipient of countless awards and accolades and their diverse portfolio of international work reflects their core commitment to enriching the built environment by creating projects with social, environmental, and aesthetic integrity. The basis of their work is a collective, rigorous exploration of fit and form, driven by ideas about function, place, the form-making process, and the role of design in human settlement.

Benjamin Noriega-Ortiz

Benjamin Noriega-Ortiz is recognized as one of the world’s most stylish and influential interior designers. Throughout his projects, he captures an unusual sense of openness and light through the use of color, materials, architecture, and the unexpected integration of timeless fashion. His sensuous and sometimes ethereal work seamlessly marries architecture, interior design, and decoration. Benjamin has developed a reputation for his inventive commercial interior design, from stores and restaurants to elegantly whimsical hotels, including the Mondrian SoHo. He is also well known for his high end residential projects for such clients as Lenny Kravitz, Michael Fuchs, Russell Simmons. Patricia Field and Sean “Diddy” Combs. In addition to his firm, Benjamin founded ABYU Lighting in 2007 with his lifetime partner artist Steven Wine. The couture lighting manufacturer is dedicated to the creation of whimsical and creative fixtures, including those appearing in 35XV.

Williams NewYork

WILLIAMS NEWYORK is a global brand marketing firm based in Manhattan, and led by founder David Williams.

FX FOWLE

BENJAMIN
